### Protocols

```{r}

list.files("protocols", recursive = TRUE, full.names = FALSE) |> 
  enframe() |> 
  rename(Protocol = value) |> 
  select(Protocol) |> 
  #separate(col = Protocol, into = c("Folder", "Protocol", "deep_protocol"), sep = "\\/") |> 
  #mutate(Protocol = ifelse(is.na(deep_protocol), Protocol, paste0(Protocol,"/",deep_protocol))) |> 
  mutate(Protocol = stringr::str_split(string = Protocol, pattern = "\\/")) |> 
  mutate(Focus = map_chr(.x = Protocol, .f = ~ .x[1])) |> 
  mutate(Protocol = map_chr(.x = Protocol, .f = ~ paste0(.x[-1], collapse = "/"))) |> 
  select(Focus, Protocol) |> 
  gt() |> 
  gtExtras::gt_theme_538()


```
